app_detail:
※ Olive Young App Permissions

[Required] 

- None 

[Optional] 

- To provide better services, Olive Young utilizes the following functions of your device.


① Photos: For image attachments (private inquiries, photo reviews)

② Camera: For barcode scanning, image attachments (private inquiries, photo reviews)


*Your permission is requested before we access these functions. Rejecting app permissions will not restrict your basic use of services in any way.

Customer Service: +1-800-523-6115
